ComicInfo.Summary:
Big game hunter Roger and his sweetheart Betty are stalked by Syvva, a were-tigress seeking revenge for the killing of her mate. The hunter sees through her plot, but has to kill her over and over again, because cats have nine lives.
A farmer is bewitched by his neighbor and has to endure a rain of stones.
A young couple running a diner cater their food to a mysterious stranger living all by himself. When the police suspects foul play and breaks down the door, they discover a horrid, giant, man-eating caterpillar.
Mark Denton has pawned his shadow to a curio dealer dabbling with the black arts. When people beging to shun him, only his fianc√©e Joan stands by him. Together they manage to retrieve the missing shadow.
When investigating the legend of the English highwayman Chad Burgess (and searching for his legendary gold treasure), Dr. Paul Furness and his wife do actually encounter him. The two hundred year old spectre drives them insane.
ComicInfo.Title: The Nine Horrors; The Devil's Stones; The Hungry Lodger; Shadows in Pawn; Spectral Ships; The Blood Money of Galloping Chad Burgess
